channel.title: Urgent Please Help =[
channel.description:
I have spent about a week or two, working on my private server for about 8 hours a day. But when I released it, after about 20+ people online, my computer crashed. I think if I keep a limit to about ten things will be okay. So how do I make a max users logged in script?
Thanks!

item.title: Urgent Please Help =[
item.dc:creator: @picostud picostud
item.description:
@picostud wrote:

No my computer really is good, I mean 2GB of RAM, AMD Athlon X2 4200+ 2.2GHz etc.

I might have to much code, I mean I got errors before stating that my code was to large lol.

Read full topic

item.title: Urgent Please Help =[
item.dc:creator: @ry60003333 ry60003333
item.description:
@ry60003333 wrote:

[quote=“xx qwertyuiop xx, post:4, topic:193585”][quote author=picostud link=topic=257714.msg2140550#msg2140550 date=1206688010]after about 20+ people online, my computer crashed.
[/quote]
Holy fuck. You must have the ultimate “public boolean process”.[/quote]
Lol yea. Or a mega crappy computer. RS servers these days are 100% screwed up. There like the scenery behind a play, it looks great, but its held together with thin rubber bands. When the play starts, it comes crashing down.

item.title: Urgent Please Help =[
item.dc:creator: @The_Dark_Abbys The Dark Abbys
item.description:
@The_Dark_Abbys wrote:

Hey there, i am quite a new coder but i think what your looking for can be solved by…

Open up your playerhandler.java (dont know y i sed npchandler earlier lol)

and search for public static final int maxPlayers

It should be near to the top,

anyway you should see public static final int maxPlayers = NUMBER

Change that number to the max players you would like to connect

I “think” that is all you need to do, if anybody would like to expand on this please do

Read full topic
